alternative_parents.description: Organosulfur compounds a sulfenyl group with the general formula RS (R = organyl).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfenyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a nitrogen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organic nitrogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Organic derivatives of thiophosphonic acid, thiophosphoric acid, dithiophosphoric acid, or phosphorotrithioic acid, or derivatives thereof. Thiophosphonic acid, dithiophosphoric acid, thiophosphoric acid, and phosphorotrithioic acid are thiophosphorus compounds with the formula OP(O)(=S), OP(S)(=S)O, OP(O)(=S)O, and OP(=S)(S)S, respectively.
class.name: Organothiophosphorus compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as phosphoramidothioic-acid-o,s-diesters. These are organooxygen compounds containing a O,S-diester derivative of phosphoroamidothioic acid. They have the general structure RSP(=O)(OR')(NH2), where R,R' are organyl groups.

direct_parent.description: Organooxygen compounds containing a O,S-diester derivative of phosphoroamidothioic acid. They have the general structure RSP(=O)(OR')(NH2), where R,R' are organyl groups.
direct_parent.name: Phosphoramidothioic-acid-O,S-diesters

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organooxygen compounds containing a O,S-diester derivative of phosphoroamidothioic acid. They have the general structure RSP(=O)(OR')(NH2), where R,R' are organyl groups.
subclass.name: Phosphoramidothioic-acid-O,S-diesters

superclass.description: Organic compounds containing the phosphorus atom.
superclass.name: Organophosphorus compounds
